newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turk Sabanci Holding to double capital to 50 trln.
newsitem.headline: Turk Sabanci Holding to double capital to 50 trln.

text.p: Sabanci Holding, one of Turkey's leading industrial conglomerates, is planning to double its paid-in capital to 50 trillion lira, the company said.
"This decision aims at strengthening the structure through new investments and new enterprises," the holding said in a statement.
"The group also plans to double its capital to 50 trillion lira from 25 trillion," it added.
The company said its board decided to add last year's profit of six trillion lira to the equities.
Sabanci holding raised equities by 143.7 percent to 40.7 trillion lira in 1996.
